attributes.action: Say "no" to school selection by lottery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a proposal that schools should be able to select a proportion of their intake by lottery.  It will be very unfair on children (and bad for the environment) if they are not be able to go to their local school and have to travel a long distance to other schools outside the area.  Children (and parents) should have a choice of school, rather than having to submit to a lottery.
